new_triples_.Used_text: 5.1 external short circuit  The cell shall be standard charged. The plus and minus terminals of the cell shall be short circuited with a wire having 50mΩ or less resistance, and left for 1 hour.

new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell

new_triples_.Used_text: The oven is to remain for 30 minutes at 130±2°C before the test is discontinued.
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell

new_triples_.Used_text: The impact test procedure involves placing a fully charged battery on a flat surface, positioning a 15.8mm diameter steel rod across the center, and dropping a 9.1kg weight from a height of 610mm.
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell

new_triples_.Used_text: The crush test procedure involves placing the battery between two planes, applying pressure using a 32mm diameter cylinder until the pressure reaches 17.2MPa, and releasing the pressure once it reaches 13kN.
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell

new_triples_.Used_text: is to be dropped from a height of 24+1 inch (610mm) onto the sample.  不起火，不爆炸。

new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell

new_triples_.Used_text: 【危险！ 】 [ Danger!]
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonRechargeableCellsAndBatteries

new_triples_.Used_text: Do not use the battery in a place where the temperature exceeds 60°C.
new_triples_.head: BatteryCell

new_triples_.Used_text: Do not expose the battery to fire or heat sources.
new_triples_.head: BatteryCell

new_triples_.Used_text: Don't immerse, throw, wet the battery in water / seawater.
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell
new_triples_.tail: Don't immerse, throw, wet the battery in water / seawater.

new_triples_.Used_text: Don't store the battery in a pocket or a bag together with metallic objects such as keys, necklaces, hair pins, coins, or screws.
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell
new_triples_.tail: Don't store the battery in a pocket or a bag together with metallic objects such as keys, necklaces, hair pins, coins, or screws.

new_triples_.Used_text: Don't short circuit (+) and ( -) terminals with metallic object intentionally.
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell
new_triples_.tail: Don't short circuit (+) and ( -) terminals with metallic object intentionally.

new_triples_.Used_text: Don't heat partial area of the battery with heated
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell
new_triples_.tail: Don't heat partial area of the battery with heated

new_triples_.Used_text: 9 不要  金属  ...
new_triples_.head: SAN.ve TIC.LTD.STI.
new_triples_.tail: Don't short circuit (+) and ( -) terminals with metallic object intentionally.

new_triples_.Used_text: Don't step on the battery and throw or drop the battery on the hard floor to avoid mechanical shock.
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell
new_triples_.tail: Avoid mechanical shock due to stepping on or dropping the battery on hard floors

new_triples_.Used_text: Don't disassemble the battery or modify the battery design including  electric circuit.
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell
new_triples_.tail: Do not disassemble or modify the battery design including electric circuit

new_triples_.Used_text: Don't use seriously scared or deformed battery.
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell
new_triples_.tail: Avoid using severely twisted or deformed batteries

new_triples_.Used_text: Don't put the battery into a microwave oven, dryer or high -pressure container.
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell
new_triples_.tail: Avoid placing the battery in a microwave oven, dryer, or high-pressure container

new_triples_.Used_text: Don't use o
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell
new_triples_.tail: Avoid using batteries from other manufacturers, different types, or different specifications (such as dry cells, nickel-metal hydride batteries, or nickel-cadmium batteries)

new_triples_.Used_text: r deformed battery.
new_triples_.head: R Deformed Battery

new_triples_.Used_text: 储存过程中，若发现电池发热异常、变色、变形或其他反常情况，请停止使用电池。
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell
new_triples_.tail: Stop using the battery if the battery becomes abnormally hot, discoloration, deformation, or abnormal conditions is detected during use, charge, or storage.

new_triples_.Used_text: Stop using the battery if the battery becomes abnormally hot, discoloration, deformation, or abnormal conditions is detected during use, charge, or storage.
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell
new_triples_.tail: Stop using the battery if the battery becomes abnormally hot, discoloration, deformation, or abnormal conditions is detected during use, charge, or storage.

new_triples_.Used_text: 若电池漏液或产生臭味，请将其立刻远离火源。
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell
new_triples_.tail: Keep away from fire immediately when leakage or foul odors are detected.

new_triples_.Used_text: Keep away from fire immediately when leakage or foul odors are detected.
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell
new_triples_.tail: Keep away from fire immediately when leakage or foul odors are detected.

new_triples_.Used_text: 如果液体粘到皮肤或衣服上，立即用清水冲洗。若液体进入到眼睛，不要揉擦，用清水冲洗并马上就医。
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell
new_triples_.tail: If liquid leaks onto your skin or cloths, wash well with fresh water immediately. If liquid leaking from the battery gets into your eyes, don't ru

new_triples_.Used_text: If liquid leaks onto your skin or cloths, wash well with fresh water immediately.
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell
new_triples_.tail: Wash with fresh water immediately if liquid leaks onto skin or clothes

new_triples_.Used_text: If liquid leaking from the battery gets into your eyes, don't rub your eyes and wash them with clean water and go to see a doctor immediately.
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell
new_triples_.tail: Do not rub eyes and wash with clean water immediately if liquid enters eyes; seek medical attention immediately

new_triples_.Used_text: If the terminals of the battery become dirty, wipe with a dry cloth before using the battery.
new_triples_.head: LithiumIonCell
new_triples_.tail: Wipe terminals with a dry cloth before use if they become dirty

new_triples_.Used_text: 10 若电池端子脏污，请用干布擦拭后再使用电池。

new_triples_.Used_text: If the battery is needed to be stored for a long period, battery should be removed from the application and stored in a place where humidity and temperature are low.

new_triples_.tail: stored in a place with low humidity and temperature
